response.original_title: Zaky's Adventures: The Earth Has a Fever
response.overview: Zaky's Adventures -The Earth Has a Feverâ€™ takes children on an exciting journey of discovery that not only entertains but also educates us about Climate Change and what we can do for the environment.  Through the creepy forests of Shadow Valley to riding down the raging rapids, Zaky & his friends embark on a great adventure, learning the importance of friendship, teamwork and making new friends along the way.
response.title: Zaky's Adventures: The Earth Has a Fever
